title: recovering my account
body: Does any1 know what i can do if i have forgot my password and i cant reach my old email to my account??  plz help!

replies.body: We can help!  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account recovery team will investigate your specific case and help with updating your account info, like your email address.  We'll see you there!
